experience.title: CodeChef Chapter | Coding Competition
experience.name: Ayush Rudani
experience.description: The event was a great success, I enjoyed a lot in speaking at DDU Codechef chapter. First I prepared for the event details and then I prepered for the ttopics that was suggested by the team.

experience.title: Event Planning 101: From Concept to Execution
experience.name: Avery Johnson
experience.description: Join me as we dive into the fundamentals of event planning, from brainstorming and ideation to execution and post-event analysis. We'll cover everything you need to know to create successful and memorable events.

experience.title: Lessons Learned from Planning a Large-Scale Conference
experience.name: Nina Patel
experience.description: Planning a conference can be a daunting task, but it's also incredibly rewarding. In this talk, I'll share some of the challenges we faced when planning our annual conference, and the strategies we used to overcome them.

experience.title: Maximizing Sponsorship Revenue for Your Event
experience.name: Mark Williams
experience.description: Sponsorship revenue can be a significant source of income for events of all sizes. In this workshop, I'll share my tips for identifying potential sponsors, creating sponsorship packages, and maximizing revenue.

experience.title: Designing Immersive Event Experiences
experience.name: Rachel Chen
experience.description: Event design is about more than just aesthetics - it's about creating an immersive experience that transports guests to another world. In this talk, I'll share my approach to designing events that engage all the senses and leave a lasting impression.
